name: jquery-todo-list
description: A side project that demonstrates a To-Do List built using jQuery. View the demo on [codepen](https://codepen.io/sinharaksh1t/full/gozabO/)! ## Usage * Click on the items to mark them as done. * Click on the delete (trash-can) icon to delete the to-do permanently. * Click on the pencil (edit) icon to edit the already existing to-do. * Use the plus sign to toggle to-do text input area.
